main.name: Kelvin Njenga
main.description: I would like to thank you for visiting my digital resume :) allow me to begin with a brief introduction. My name is Kelvin Njenga and I am a Software developer. I use JAVA and the SpringBoot framework to develop JAVA-based back-end server applications. I invite you to take a look at some of my listed previous projects and used tech-stacks. I look forward to getting connected and working together on some cool projects
main.bio: An Info worth mentioning is that for the most part of my Software development journey I have worked in the Financial Technology Industry. This also allowed me to be exposed in the EMV(EuroPay, MasterCard & VISA) payments Application development space. Primarily, EMV Level 3 device testing and compliance while using approved toolkits from VISA and MasterCard.
main.contactmessage: My phone and email address are always open for communication. I sincerely look forward to hearing from you soon.

resume.skillmessage: I am vastly knowledgable in the most commonly used frameworks and technologies as detailed in my resume. Below is a brief skills gauge of my comfortability using common development tools and frameworks.

education.description: I mostly majored in software development within the IT faculty. Object-oriented programming was among my best unit subjects and i ended up interestingly using JAVA to develop an android application for my school project. This was quite an interesting experience (really hard :D) for a first-timer.

At strathmore I gained some professional skills to apply in an actual work environment. Generally, the course incorporated implementation of solid work ethics, protocol observation, priority task management and essential leadership skills. :)

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: At KLx I use JAVA, the Palmyra Framework and other Java related dev-tools for middleware software solutions development. Software solutions are provided for KLx to Caceis of the (Credit Agricole Group).

work.title: JAVA Software Developer
work.description: Providing JAVA software developer consultancy service for Team-IT of the (MoOngy group) at KLx (Subsidiary of Credit Agricole Group).

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: At DIL I was a software engineer using C and JAVA programming languages to mainly develop EMV Level 3 certified Point of Sale applications. I also used JAVA and the springboot framework to develop internal REST-APIs. Other responsibilities involved developing and testing Point of Sale applications inline with EMVco compliance and PCI-DSS standards.

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Working at RUBis was among the interesting projects I worked on at RUBiS; we launched and produced K-wallet, a product that served as a payment wallet for fuel and lubricant payments used by RUBIS energy (KenolKobil) customers. I was the senior POS application developer responsible for implementations of Smart POS device features.

work.title: Android Developer
work.description: Worked at Vortex Solution as an android developer using JAVA 8 as part of my career development program. I was part of a team that developed an inventory management application.

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Personal projects are very rewarding and I am pleased to have a couple of personal repositories that are active and some still in development. Sometimes, I also contribute to open source projects whenever possible with the initiative and hope of keeping Open souce projects alive and well. :)
